title: CGCRI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Project Associate Post
description: Central Glass and Ceramic Research Institute (CGCRI) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., B.E/ B.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the CGCRI Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of applicati...
